question: The crime rate nowadays is decreasing compared to the past due to advanced technology which can prevent and solve crime. Do you agree or disagree?
text: There are several forms of criminal activities taking place around the world. It is considered that as compared to past decade the rate of crimes is decreasing as because of the advancement in technology which enable us to prevent and solve illegal contacts. This is a will discuss why I agree with this statement.

To begin with, the foremost reason why the crime among declined due to advance technique is that the invention of various computer arguments to surveillance people around the world would stop now a days it can see that every corner around has hidden camera that absorb or collect all the activities that people does put stop hence, it is easy to prevent some sort of crimes to a great extent .For example, in present days huge blocks of building and public areas are under the control of the wireless camera. This, it reduces the number of robberies and other illegal activities.

Furthermore, in past decades, it is extremely difficult to find and solve violations and misdeeds. But nowadays, different technological facilities allowed to identify and also locate the criminals which makes the authorities  work easy and fast .For instant, the individual sometimes hide themselves after conducting crimes and the modern technological services enables to trace their hidden location is lit hence people are petrified to do severe criminal activities which reduce the rate of crime.
To conclude, technological improvement always makes the human life simple and also at present era various crimes are prevented and solved due to the development in this field.
